) } function login(email, password, position) { if (email === "" || password === "") { return ( alert("아이디와 비밀번호를 모두 입력하세요") ) } else { let loginInfo = { "email": email, "password": password, "position": position }; // axios.post('https://pk-cog.url/login/' + position, loginInfo) // .then((result) => { // console.log('성공'); // }) // .catch((result) => { // console.log('실패'); // }); axios({ method: 'post', url: 'https://pk-cog.url/login/' + position, data: JSON.stringify(loginInfo) }); } } export default AccessPage;
